CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting
CurrentVersion.description: Now, Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting when recording is enabled. This, along with meeting transcript and meeting chat, enables users to ask Copilot to summarize or find specific information from screen-shared content (e.g., ‘Which products had the highest sales?’), consolidate insights across both the conversation and presentation (e.g., 'What was the feedback per slide?'), and draft new content based on the entire meeting (e.g., 'Rewrite the paragraph shared on the screen incorporating the feedback from the chat’). This works for any content shared while sharing your desktop screen (including but not limited to documents, slides, spreadsheets, and websites, irrespective of platform or app). Support for PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard in Teams will be available at a later date.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender

Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Granular trigger throttling
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, we are introducing more granular trigger throttling limits to isolate the impact of a surge in noisy trigger volumes and prevent other policies from being affected. This ensures that organizations can receive critical alerts without being throttled by these limits. By default, the throttling limits will be applied as follows: All sensitive triggers, including HR signals, Azure AD leavers, and custom triggers, will be limited to 15,000 per day per trigger. All other triggers will be limited to 5,000 per day per trigger. Additionally, the policy health warning messages will be enhanced to assist admins with appropriate permissions in identifying and addressing noisy triggers effectively. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

By default, the throttling limits will be applied as follows: All sensitive triggers, including HR signals, Azure AD leavers, and custom triggers, will be limited to 15,000 per day per trigger. CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. New search features include the ability to conduct precise searches using identifier (message ID), sensitivity labels, audit log, or evidence file. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

It helps you to define your organization's ownership criteria and identify sites that are not compliant. You can also choose to automate actions on sites that remain ownerless for more than 3 months to prevent risks of data mismanagement.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Using Data Access Governance to understand the tenant's current permission landscape
CurrentVersion.description:
SharePoint admins can now use Data Access Governance (DAG) to understand their tenant's current permission landscape and make better decisions regarding applications based on permissions such as Copilot. DAG now provides a report that will reflect the latest state of permissions in the entire tenant and return sites that have a greater count of permissioned users than the SharePoint admin specified number. This count considers users accessing sites via site membership and users accessing via unique permissions, as well and acts like a potential threshold for oversharing. Along with the permissioned user count, the report also provides information on the number of existing sharing links (Anyone and People-in-your-org) in those sites and enables SharePoint admins to identify potential root causes for oversharing. You can find more details about this report at the link below.
More info: https://aka.ms/DAGReportOnPermissions

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Site Access Review offers a way for SharePoint tenants to empower site owners using Data Access Governance
CurrentVersion.description:
SharePoint admins can use Data Access Governance reports to discover potential oversharing within their tenant. Once discovered, SharePoint admins can now request that site owners review permissions using the specific context of that report from within the report. They can also track all such requests raised from a central location. The site owners will receive a corresponding email and are redirected to a section within the site (site reviews) that clearly enunciates the corresponding data related to sharing and permissions along with the ability to take action. This feature is now available for Data Access Governance - Permissions based reports - count of permissioned user report.
More info: https://aka.ms/DAGSiteAccessReviews

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Block a user for your organization
CurrentVersion.description: With the availability of the delete API (removeallaccessforuser API), it does not stop the malicious user from resending the message to the same victim. To help prevent that, a block user API will allow the admin to block the malicious user from reaching out again. To make this even more effective, we will utilize a similar feature as the allow/block list in federation to block the malicious user from the entire organization.

To make this even more effective, we will utilize a similar feature as the allow/block list in federation to block the malicious user from the entire organization.

CurrentVersion.description: Corporate communicators, network admins, and Engage admins can remove chosen conversation threads from the Engage Home Feed, storylines feed, and email digests. Conversations continue to show in community feeds, user profiles, and search. Muting a conversation does not affect notifications.

OldVersion.description: Corporate communicators, network admins, and Engage admins can remove chosen conversation threads from the Engage Home Feed, storylines feed, and email digests. Conversations continue to show in community feeds, user profiles, and search. Muting a conversation does not affect notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Whiteboard can be added to Mesh event
CurrentVersion.description: We will not release this feature at this time. We are sorry for any inconvenience and will continue to share updated roadmap entries as additional Mesh features and functionality become available. Mesh event participants can now use Microsoft Whiteboard in Mesh 3D environments. This functionality will enable users to collaborate spatially as avatars on a 2D whiteboard present in the virtual space, available on PC and Meta Quest devices. Mesh event attendees can use inking, annotation, and other built-in tools to brainstorm, plan, and share with others on a digital canvas in real time. Copilot integration with Whiteboard helps suggest and organize ideas directly on your canvas while in Mesh.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Whiteboard can be added to Mesh event
OldVersion.description: Mesh event participants can now use Microsoft Whiteboard in Mesh 3D environments. This functionality will enable users to collaborate spatially as avatars on a 2D whiteboard present in the virtual space, available on PC and Meta Quest devices. Mesh event attendees can use inking, annotation, and other built-in tools to brainstorm, plan, and share with others on a digital canvas in real time. Copilot integration with Whiteboard helps suggest and organize ideas directly on your canvas while in Mesh.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New collaborative Project Studio environment in Microsoft Mesh
CurrentVersion.description: The Project Studio environment is a new space for immersive meetings and Mesh events. This space has been designed for synchronous teamwork and productivity for small groups to collaborate on content. Collaboration tools like whiteboards will be added to the environment as they become available.

This space has been designed for synchronous teamwork and productivity for small groups to collaborate on content. Collaboration tools like whiteboards will be added to the environment as they become available.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on Meta Quest headsets supports hand interactions
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Mesh app users on Meta Quest 2, 3, and Pro headsets can now use their hands to use the app, move around in event environments, and interact with objects. Motion controllers continue to be supported, and users can switch between using controllers or their hands while using the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Viva Connections cards in Microsoft 365 Copilots
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 Copilot brings Viva Connections cards to conversations. When a card is relevant for a specific topic, the card will surface in the conversation chat and users will be able to interact with it directly from Microsoft 365 Copilot without interrupting the user's flow.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Introducing archival and other enforcement actions with inactive site lifecycle management policy
CurrentVersion.description: Address inactive content on your tenant with inactive sites policy. Admins can configure policies to Detect inactive sites, send notifications to all site owners, and archive these sites or put them in a read-only state if there is no action from notification recipients.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Site access review from Sharing link reports in Data Access Governance
CurrentVersion.description: Site access review allows SharePoint admins to delegate access governance to site owners in the context of potential oversharing as defined within DAG reports. We earlier released site access review from within "Content shared with everyone except external users" report. Now, the same functionality will be available from all "Sharing link" reports as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Vote on and archive Questions in Teams Q&A
CurrentVersion.description: Question voting allows instance participants to upvote the most important questions and sort by highest votes or recent activity. This gives moderators the ability to derive insights from the audience about what topics they care the most about and address them. Additionally, for questions that might be outdated or irrelevant, moderators can move them to a separate feed to ensure that presenters can focus on providing the most value to attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remote contact management for common area phones
CurrentVersion.description: This roadmap item is cancelled and replaced by 81379. We are sorry for any inconvenience. IT admins will be able to manage and add contacts to Teams phone devices deployed in shared spaces through the Teams admin center. This ensures users across the organization can easily call important contacts, such as emergency numbers or help desks.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remote contact management for common area phones
OldVersion.description: IT admins will be able to manage and add contacts to Teams phone devices deployed in shared spaces through the Teams admin center. This ensures users across the organization can easily call important contacts, such as emergency numbers or help desks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution available in additional meeting spaces
CurrentVersion.description: You can now take advantage of speaker recognition and transcript attribution, and AI capabilities in additional meeting spaces, from those equipped with a Teams Room to those relying on a user's PC in a bring you own device (BYOD) room. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique voice profile for each participant enabling intelligent recaps and maximum value from Microsoft 365 Copilot in Teams meetings. Users can easily and securely enroll voices via Teams Settings. A Teams Premium license is required on the host desktop in a BYOD room.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot on OneNote canvas
CurrentVersion.description: Use Copilot right in your workflow by invoking Copilot to generate a summary, a to-do list, or help you rewrite the content on the page or based on your selection.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot on OneNote canvas

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Enterprise Application Insights for SharePoint sites
CurrentVersion.description:
Enterprise Application Insights is a powerful report which helps SharePoint Administrators to discover all the SharePoint sites that are allowed access by third-party applications registered in your tenant. The report also provides details on the application's permission and requests count to help admins take further action to strengthen the security of the site.

It is part of SharePoint Advanced Management capabilities.

OldVersion.description:

The report also provides details on the application's permission and requests count to help admins take further action to strengthen the security of the site.

It is part of SharePoint Advanced Management capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Authoring Copilot in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: Authoring Copilot in SharePoint combines the power of Large Language Models (LLMs), your data in the Microsoft Graph, and best practices to create engaging new web pages. It can utilize built-in templates or custom templates from your organization, along with existing documents as grounding data, to generate high-quality page content. All of this is achieved while upholding our commitment to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

All of this is achieved while upholding our commitment to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Data Security Analytics
CurrentVersion.description:
Data Security analytics will serve as a launchpad for administrators, enabling them to swiftly navigate day-to-day tasks. It will provide a comprehensive overview of an organization’s sensitive data landscape, visibility into potential risks, and offer contextual recommendations to strengthen the organization's data security posture. The Data Security Copilot will serve as an intelligent AI assistant layered on top of data security analytics, supporting tasks related to administration, risk assessment, alert triage, and reporting. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Usage reports for bookable desks in the Pro Management portal
CurrentVersion.description: With a Teams Shared Device license assigned to a desk pool, admins can view valuable analytics for these spaces including number of peripherals, usage, reservations, and occupancy under 'Reports' in the portal.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Usage reports for bookable desks in the Pro Management portal
OldVersion.description: With a Teams Shared Device license assigned to a desk pool, admins can view valuable analytics for these spaces including number of peripherals, usage, reservations, and occupancy under 'Reports' in the portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-meeting Chat, Copilot, and Notes panes can be popped out from the meeting window
CurrentVersion.description: When you are in meetings or calls, you will be able to pop out, drag, and resize your meeting panes from the meeting window. This includes Chat, Copilot, and Notes side panes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Stream Custom Agent and Bot Responses
CurrentVersion.description: Custom engine agents and Teams bots can now stream responses like Microsoft Copilot. They can provide real-time updates on their actions while delivering parts of the response as they generate it, making interactions feel faster and more engaging.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Stream Custom Agent and Bot Responses
OldVersion.description: Custom engine agents and Teams bots can now stream responses like Microsoft Copilot. They can provide real-time updates on their actions while delivering parts of the response as they generate it, making interactions feel faster and more engaging.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – AI enabled file summaries on Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly get a summary of Word, PPT, and PDF files that were shard with you in chat, without leaving your flow of work. Tap the summary icon on the file, and get a summary generated by Copilot. Now you can consume and comprehend the content without reading the entire document on a small mobile screen.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect prompt injection attacks and mentions of protected materials in GenAI prompts and responses
CurrentVersion.description:
In Communication Compliance, we're introducing the ability to detect potentially risky Generative AI interactions using Azure Content Safety's Prompt shields and Protected materials classifiers. Detect risk of jailbreak prompt exploitation by malicious users and identify if GenAI responses contain branded/copyrighted material so organizations can maintain content originality and protect their reputations.

Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Restrict access action support for semantic models in Fabric
CurrentVersion.description: Your organization can now control who can access your data depending on the sensitive information detected in Fabric semantic models. DLP restrict access action allows you to block access to guest users or all users depending on what labels or sensitive information types match your sematic models. This is in addition to the ability already supported by DLP policies to audit and notify users via Policy Tips based on sensitive content within Fabric semantic models and lakehouses.

CurrentVersion.description: ?In space analytics, use Copilot to analyze and explain key data points and trends in your space utilization graphs. It compares current utilization metrics such as occupancy, desk usage, and room bookings against previous time periods (e.g. last month, last quarter), highlighting important changes and trends.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
CurrentVersion.description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).

CurrentVersion.description: Create with Copilot in Excel helps customers write prompts to generate tailored templates and tables, using multi-turn conversion to refine the table schema, formulas, and visuals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365):  Discover, acquire, and manage agents through in-app store in Word and PowerPoint
CurrentVersion.description: With Copilot extensibility, users can discover, acquire, and manage agents through the unified store. We are excited to introduce the Microsoft 365 unified store to Office documents, enabling users to discover, acquire, and manage agents directly within the in-app store for Word and PowerPoint, with Excel support coming soon.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Unified Planner tab experience in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: With this unified tab experience, you can now create and add any basic or premium plan to a Planner tab in Microsoft Teams. To try it, go to any Teams channel and search for Planner after selecting the Apps icon.

OldVersion.title: Planner: Unified Planner tab experience in Microsoft Teams
OldVersion.description: With this unified tab experience, you can now create and add any basic or premium plan to a Planner tab in Microsoft Teams. To try it, go to any Teams channel and search for Planner after selecting the Apps icon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot general availability for GCC
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection for the GCC environment is available at no additional cost for Microsoft 365 GCC users who sign in with their Microsoft Entra account (no Microsoft 365 Copilot license required). For users signed in with a Microsoft Entra account, Copilot offers enterprise data protection (EDP) and a simplified, ad-free user interface designed for work, powered by the latest large language models with optional web grounding. The general availability of this release will be delivered to the users with web grounding OFF by default to meet US Government requirements. This will help protect sensitive information which should not leave the GCC compliance boundary.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot/overview

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot general availability for GCC
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection for the GCC environment is available at no additional cost for Microsoft 365 GCC users who sign in with their Microsoft Entra account (no Microsoft 365 Copilot license required).  The general availability of this release will be delivered to the users with web grounding OFF by default to meet US Government requirements.  This will help protect sensitive information which should not leave the GCC compliance boundary.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot/overview

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot agents in Teams group chats
CurrentVersion.description: Now users can discover and add Copilot agents to group chats in Teams to extend Microsoft Copilot to their flow of work.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot agents in Teams group chats
OldVersion.description: Now users can discover and add Copilot agents to group chats in Teams to extend Microsoft Copilot to their flow of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub – Data Assessments
CurrentVersion.description: Data assessments in Microsoft Purview AI Hub provides a way for admins to drive data security outcomes by creating scoped assessments, reviewing the data sensitivity and user accesses on locations, and performing remediation actions to mitigate risk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Copilot with enterprise data protection prompt metric
CurrentVersion.description: A new metric counting the prompts submitted through Business Chat (web) or Copilot with enterprise data protection metric will be added to Viva Insights advanced insights and Copilot dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Presenter Chat while screensharing
CurrentVersion.description: Enable presenters to more easily access the meeting chat while screensharing by adding an entry point in the presenter toolbar.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Presenter Chat while screensharing
OldVersion.description: Enable presenters to more easily access the meeting chat while screensharing by adding an entry point in the presenter toolbar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Real-Time Mic Volume Indicator for Teams Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing the Mic Volume Indicator for Teams meetings, a feature designed to provide real-time visual feedback on your audio levels. Positioned on the user bar, this indicator ensures your voice is captured correctly, eliminating the need to ask, “Can you hear me?” By offering continuous visual confirmation, it enhances user confidence and reduces communication breakdowns. It l streamlines meeting efficiency by minimizing interruptions and ensuring seamless communication.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extensibility for PSTN calls
CurrentVersion.description: Third-party application developers will be able to extend the PSTN calling experience in Teams with contextual information, making it possible for Teams users to have access to relevant data without leaving the call experience. This brings additional context and workflow integration into calling experiences and makes customer facing professionals more efficient by having data from line of business applications readily available. This functionality is available for developers to integrate their applications and add new functionality to calls.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extensibility for PSTN calls
OldVersion.description: Third-party application developers will be able to extend the PSTN calling experience in Teams with contextual information, making it possible for Teams users to have access to relevant data without leaving the call experience. This brings additional context and workflow integration into calling experiences and makes customer facing professionals more efficient by having data from line of business applications readily available. This functionality is available for developers to integrate their applications and add new functionality to calls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Import and Search function support for Sensitive service domains group
CurrentVersion.description: Purview Endpoint DLP improves the management of Sensitive service domains group by allowing you to import a URL group and search a specific URL across all groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Delayed simultaneous ring setting
CurrentVersion.description: For teams with shared call responsibilities, delayed simultaneous ring will ensure calls configure the intended recipient first, instead of notifying everyone the moment a call comes in.  This helps reduce noise and minimizes distractions —especially for roles like delegates and customer service teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom Meeting Branding - Support multiple meeting themes per customization policy
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now create and assign multiple meeting themes to a customization policy in the Teams Admin Center. This will allow meeting organizers who are assigned to a customization policy the ability to select from different meeting theme options while scheduling their meetings. Note - this feature requires a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Edge contextual capabilities in Business Chat work mode
CurrentVersion.description: In Business Chat work mode, users can ask Copilot questions about web pages and PDFs opened in the Edge browser using page context, such as “summarize this page". This feature is currently also available in Business Chat web mode.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Enhanced functionalities to manage SharePoint Embedded Containers through SharePoint Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: The new update empowers the SharePoint Embedded Administrators (SPE Admins) to manage their containers better through sorting and filtering capabilities as well as set sensitivity labels on containers. The SPE Admins now also have user role management capabilities to add, reassign, or remove users from various roles of a container.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Apply sensitivity labels with user-defined permissions in Office for the web in Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: Office for the web in Microsoft 365 supports the application of sensitivity labels with user-defined permissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize the location of Teams notifications
CurrentVersion.description: You can now customize where your Teams notification appear on your screen. Options include bottom right, top right, bottom left, and top left, allowing you to choose the most convenient and least intrusive location for a better experience and productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Auto-association of BYOD room devices in the Pro Management portal
CurrentVersion.description: Manually associating peripherals to rooms may feel like an endless task if your organization has several bring your own device (BYOD) rooms. IT admins can streamline the process and get enhanced inventory visibility with this feature which utilizes meeting room invite data to intelligently associate peripherals to these spaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat – File Sensitivity Labels in Copilot web grounding chat
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot web grounding chat responses will now show content sensitivity labels for prompts in which a user has attached or uploaded a Microsoft 365 file like Word, Excel, and PowerPoint in Business Chat web mode and Microsoft Copilot chat.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Catch up with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: With Copilot, you will be able to catch up on important updates such as a summary of new "at" mentions that need your attention, new changes made to files you've been active in, and quick snippets of new files shared with you. Catch up will be available in OneDrive Web for our commercial customers and requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license. Catch up will initially work for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Ask Copilot questions on meeting recordings
CurrentVersion.description: Select a meeting recording in your OneDrive and ask Copilot to recap the meeting, highlight parts where you were mentioned, or recommend action items and next steps. This feature requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and will be available to commercial customers on OneDrive Web.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Create a presentation from a Word file
CurrentVersion.description: With Copilot, you can create the first draft of your presentation using a Word file in just a single click. This feature requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and will be available to commercial customers on OneDrive Web.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Convert Copilot response into a Word file
CurrentVersion.description: Like a summary or FAQ that Copilot generated for you? Now, with one click, you can convert any Copilot response into a Word document. This feature requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and will be available to commercial customers on OneDrive Web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Diagnostics in the new portal
CurrentVersion.description: We are building UX to surface the diagnostics that were previously available through cmdlet to be accessible through portal UX.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New email scoring capabilities
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider risk management (IRM) email scoring logic is being updated. With current logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted multiple times, creating noise by increasing the risk score. In the new logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted once, and this new principle is applicable to the email containing multiple unallowed domains or priority content. Once this is rolled out, all the email insights in alerts will display the new count and score.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages with app cards
CurrentVersion.description: Messages containing app cards in chats and channels can now be forwarded. To use, navigate to the more actions menu of any message containing an app card, and select "Forward".

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forwarding loop components
CurrentVersion.description: You can now forward chat messages containing Loop components, allowing for seamless sharing and real-time collaboration across different chats. To forward a message, navigate to it, click on the ellipsis, and select ‘Forward’ from the menu.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages to and from channels
CurrentVersion.description: You can now forward messages between channels, allowing you to efficiently share important information with relevant team members. To forward a channel message post, channel post reply, or chat message to another channel, 1:1 or group chat, select the message’s ellipsis menu and choose Forward.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI hub in Microsoft Purview
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. 

The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity, including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts, both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: New EWS usage report
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing an Exchange Web Services (EWS) usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center that provides comprehensive insights into the applications in your tenant that use EWS. The report provides detailed information on the specific actions performed by these applications along with their respective call volumes over a selected period. This new report enhances your ability to understand EWS activity prior to EWS deprecation in Exchange Online.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Move emails between accounts in the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We’re excited to announce a new feature in Outlook that makes it easier to manage emails across multiple accounts. All personal accounts in the new Outlook for Windows can seamlessly move emails between all their personal accounts, streamlining organization and productivity. For work or school users, this feature is controlled by a policy managed by administrators. By enabling this policy, admins can grant their users the ability to move emails between accounts in a way that aligns with organizational needs and policies. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Copilot chat-assisted scheduling
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot now helps you schedule simple meetings such as 1:1s and focus time. Just ask Copilot to find some time with someone in your org and it will find the optimal time. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Setting to toggle comma as recipient delimiter
CurrentVersion.description: By default, Outlook Web and the New Outlook support separating recipients by using either a semicolon or a comma. This new setting allows users to choose if the comma should be used as a recipient separator or instead allowed as part of the contact name. This is helpful for organizations where contacts follow the "Last name, First name" format. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Notifications pane batching
CurrentVersion.description: Batches are groups of cards in the user's Notification pane separated by subject. Items from the same email thread, document, sheet, etc. will be grouped into a single batch. #newouotlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Tips pane entry point moving from Suite Header to Ribbon
CurrentVersion.description: The Tips pane's entry point is moving from the Suite Header (found at the top of the window) to the Help tab of the Ribbon. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Google to Entra Identity Sync service
CurrentVersion.description: Google to Entra Identity Sync service is a cloud-2-cloud user Identity onboarding and one way synchronization tool from Google workspace to Entra ID. This will be available as part of the M365 Admin center for Google compete customers moving into M365 to create the identities in M365 farm and move Drive and Mail content into Onedrive and Exchange online

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Google Groups to M365 Modern Groups Migration Service
CurrentVersion.description: Google Groups to M365 Modern Groups Migration Service is a 1st party service for migrating Google groups with the M365 Admin center as a new feature, so that Google compete customers moving to M365 would have the ability to automatically create the groups, its members, member conversations and all permissions to M365 Groups without the need to recreate the groups which is the only solution for customers moving from Google.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Unified Google Workspace Migration
CurrentVersion.description: Offer Microsoft 365 customers a seamless experience for migrating Google Workspace workloads to M365. Through a unified portal page, you can initiate and monitor migration tasks for both Gmail and Google Drive. Additionally, if your Google Workspace tenant has fewer than 1,000 users, you'll benefit from the newly revamped Gmail migration flow, which simplifies the process and guides you through each step.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remote contact management for Teams Phone devices in Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can push a set of contacts from the Teams admin center (TAC) to Teams devices as speed dial contacts.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Contact sync to Android-based Teams devices from Teams admin center
OldVersion.description: IT admins can push a set of contacts from the Teams admin center (TAC) to Teams devices as speed dial contacts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: iOS app multiple managed accounts
CurrentVersion.description: Allows people to use a single device with multiple managed accounts to access company information through Teams iOS app, with Outlook to follow.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Loop workspace sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can apply container-level sensitivity labels to Loop workspaces to prevent oversharing and manage access effectively.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
CurrentVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Estimating the Cost of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive and EndPoint
CurrentVersion.description: With OCR cost estimator, without incurring any bill and without providing azure subscription, admins will be able to estimate how much they will pay once they turn “ON” the OCR configuration for the selected locations and scope.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced content extraction and file type coverage for DLP on Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description: With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Infinite Canvas in Visio for the web
CurrentVersion.description: Infinite canvas in Visio for the web is an expansive digital canvas designed to remove spatial limitations. It will allow users to stretch their creative boundaries by providing the room they need to capture, organize, and visualize ideas without constraints.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Portfolio capabilities in Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Structure plans into portfolios and get insights on top of your portfolios

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Portfolio capabilities in Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Structure plans into portfolios and get insights on top of your portfolios

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting
CurrentVersion.description: Now, Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting when recording is enabled. This, along with meeting transcript and meeting chat, enables users to ask Copilot to summarize or find specific information from screen-shared content (e.g., ‘Which products had the highest sales?’), consolidate insights across both the conversation and presentation (e.g., 'What was the feedback per slide?'), and draft new content based on the entire meeting (e.g., 'Rewrite the paragraph shared on the screen incorporating the feedback from the chat’). This works for any content shared while sharing your desktop screen (including but not limited to documents, slides, spreadsheets, and websites, irrespective of platform or app). Support for PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard in Teams will be available at a later date.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Junk/Phishing reporting actions integrated with Microsoft Defender in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in classic Outlook for Windows can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Event Recap in Town hall and webinar (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for town hall and webinar event instances, just like the intelligent recap experience you are used to in meetings. Event organizer, co-organizers and presenters can now easily explore the meeting recording by speakers and topics, and access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. In addition to availability with a Teams Premium license, intelligent event recap features are also available in Copilot for Microsoft 365 licenses.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Granular trigger throttling
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, we are introducing more granular trigger throttling limits to isolate the impact of a surge in noisy trigger volumes and prevent other policies from being affected. This ensures that organizations can receive critical alerts without being throttled by these limits. By default, the throttling limits will be applied as follows: All sensitive triggers, including HR signals, Azure AD leavers, and custom triggers, will be limited to 15,000 per day per trigger. All other triggers will be limited to 5,000 per day per trigger. Additionally, the policy health warning messages will be enhanced to assist admins with appropriate permissions in identifying and addressing noisy triggers effectively. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. New search features include the ability to conduct precise searches using identifier (message ID), sensitivity labels, audit log, or evidence file. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Learner Record Sync (LRS) logs
CurrentVersion.description: Sync logs in the Viva Learning admin tab with information about assignment and completion-related ingestion errors.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Custom user mapping for learner record sync (LRS)
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now use advance mapping options to link AAD and Workday.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Custom user mapping for learner record sync (LRS)
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now use advance mapping options to link AAD and Workday.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
CurrentVersion.description: Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Add Shared Folders to Favorites in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will have the ability to add shared folders to their favorites. This enhancement offers users increased flexibility and convenience, allowing easy and quick access to important shared content directly from their Favorites list. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - Share a prompt to a Microsoft Teams team
CurrentVersion.description: Share custom prompts with members of a Microsoft Teams team, allowing team members to easily discover and utilize these prompts in Copilot Lab.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
CurrentVersion.description: Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook themes generated by Microsoft Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Make Outlook yours with themes generated by Copilot. You will be able to find these themes in Settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Site ownership policy
CurrentVersion.description: Site ownership policy is a one-stop solution to effectively manage ownership needs of all SharePoint sites in your tenant. It helps you to define your organization's ownership criteria and identify sites that are not compliant. You can further notify predefined set of users of your choice to find the next best site owner or admin. You can also choose to automate actions on sites that remain ownerless for more than 3 months to prevent risks of data mismanagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: AI theme generator
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Edge will include an AI theme generator, that allows users to input a text prompt and generate a series of images to preview as browser themes. Applying the theme includes setting the generated image on the Edge new tab page, and applying the image's dominant color to the browser frame. Admins can restrict access to this feature using the AIGenThemesEnabled policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Generate keyword query language from natural language prompt in eDiscovery with Copilot for Security
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot for Security is embedded in eDiscovery to enable users to provide a search prompt in natural language and will translate into keyword query language to help expedite the start of an eDiscovery search.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Adding search to settings on Outlook for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: We recently rolled out updated settings on Outlook for iOS. To make the settings experience even better, we are now adding the ability to search within settings so that you can find exactly what you're looking for.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Get started on a draft immediately with example prompts
CurrentVersion.description: On blank documents, Copilot in Word will provide one-click examples of prompts that quickly help you get going on your document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Get started on a draft immediately with example prompts
CurrentVersion.description: On blank documents, Copilot in Word will provide one-click examples of prompts that quickly help you get going on your document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - Share a prompt with a coworker
CurrentVersion.description: Easily create, save, and share your favorite prompts using Copilot Lab, inspiring your co-workers to acheive more with Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - New and trending prompts
CurrentVersion.description: Keep track of new and trending prompts in your organization in Copilot Lab.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New ChatGPT Enterprise connector to discover and bring prompts and responses into the scope of Purview features
CurrentVersion.description: Using the unified Purview portal, organizations will be able to establish a connection to their ChatGPT Enterprise workspaces to discover, collect, and store contents of interactions of users with ChatGPT Enterprise into the scope of Purview capabilities and policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: EDU tenant type selection in policy wizard
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select tenant type for their institution from the policy wizard. This setting can be changed anytime from the wizard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Video creation in Copilot Visual Creator powered by Clipchamp
CurrentVersion.description: Clipchamp brings video creation skills to Visual Creator in Copilot. Type your prompt and Clipchamp will write a bespoke script, source high quality stock footage, and assemble a video project with music, voiceover, text overlays and transitions. Open your video project draft in Clipchamp app to continue editing, export and share. Great for informational videos, video messaging, how-to, demo and video presentations.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Using Data Access Governance to understand the tenant's current permission landscape
CurrentVersion.description:
SharePoint admins can now use Data Access Governance (DAG) to understand their tenant's current permission landscape and make better decisions regarding applications based on permissions such as Copilot. DAG now provides a report that will reflect the latest state of permissions in the entire tenant and return sites that have a greater count of permissioned users than the SharePoint admin specified number. This count considers users accessing sites via site membership and users accessing via unique permissions, as well and acts like a potential threshold for oversharing. Along with the permissioned user count, the report also provides information on the number of existing sharing links (Anyone and People-in-your-org) in those sites and enables SharePoint admins to identify potential root causes for oversharing. You can find more details about this report at the link below.
More info: https://aka.ms/DAGReportOnPermissions

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Site Access Review offers a way for SharePoint tenants to empower site owners using Data Access Governance
CurrentVersion.description:
SharePoint admins can use Data Access Governance reports to discover potential oversharing within their tenant. Once discovered, SharePoint admins can now request that site owners review permissions using the specific context of that report from within the report. They can also track all such requests raised from a central location. The site owners will receive a corresponding email and are redirected to a section within the site (site reviews) that clearly enunciates the corresponding data related to sharing and permissions along with the ability to take action. This feature is now available for Data Access Governance - Permissions based reports - count of permissioned user report.
More info: https://aka.ms/DAGSiteAccessReviews

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Email Auto-advance setting
CurrentVersion.description: The Email Auto-advance option is available in Mail settings. This will allow users to choose whether they return to the message list after taking certain actions or if they move to the next message.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Use Copilot to select and rewrite specific pieces of text in an email in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: In classic Outlook for Windows, when composing an email, customers can select portions of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite it. Users can give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and also able to modify tone and length.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse -  Viva Pulse  templates to measure Copilot readiness, adoption & impact as part of Microsoft 365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Pulse authors can now use new templates specific to M365 Copilot Readiness, Adoption & Impact to measure employee sentiment around their organization's Copilot adoption. These templates will be available as part of your Microsoft365 Copilot subscription as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Generate Pulse summary with Microsoft Copilot in Viva Pulse
CurrentVersion.description: Use Microsoft Copilot in Viva Pulse to receive an AI-generated summary of your results from a Viva Pulse report. Viva Pulse authors can share it with their team members as well use it to promote transparency.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Move menu improvements
CurrentVersion.description: Two improvements are coming to the move menu on Outlook for iOS and Android. Users will now be able to expand and collapse folders within the move menu and see folder hierarchy when searching in the move menu.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Fonts in Outlook for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: We heard feedback from you, our customers, and are adding support for choosing fonts while you compose in Outlook for iOS and Android. There is also improved support for fonts in the reading pane.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Block a user for your organization
CurrentVersion.description: With the availability of the delete API (removeallaccessforuser API), it does not stop the malicious user from resending the message to the same victim. To help prevent that, a block user API will allow the admin to block the malicious user from reaching out again. To make this even more effective, we will utilize a similar feature as the allow/block list in federation to block the malicious user from the entire organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot marks high priority mails in your inbox and provides a short summary of the mail's importance in the message list and the reading pane. Mails can be sorted and filtered by Copilot's priority. In Web and New Outlook for Windows, you can also choose to have Copilot mark low priority mails. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Mute conversations
CurrentVersion.description: Corporate communicators, network admins, and Engage admins can remove chosen conversation threads from the Engage Home Feed, storylines feed, and email digests. Conversations continue to show in community feeds, user profiles, and search. Muting a conversation does not affect notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Whiteboard can be added to Mesh event
CurrentVersion.description: We will not release this feature at this time. We are sorry for any inconvenience and will continue to share updated roadmap entries as additional Mesh features and functionality become available. Mesh event participants can now use Microsoft Whiteboard in Mesh 3D environments. This functionality will enable users to collaborate spatially as avatars on a 2D whiteboard present in the virtual space, available on PC and Meta Quest devices. Mesh event attendees can use inking, annotation, and other built-in tools to brainstorm, plan, and share with others on a digital canvas in real time. Copilot integration with Whiteboard helps suggest and organize ideas directly on your canvas while in Mesh.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New collaborative Project Studio environment in Microsoft Mesh
CurrentVersion.description: The Project Studio environment is a new space for immersive meetings and Mesh events. This space has been designed for synchronous teamwork and productivity for small groups to collaborate on content. Collaboration tools like whiteboards will be added to the environment as they become available.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on Meta Quest headsets supports hand interactions
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Mesh app users on Meta Quest 2, 3, and Pro headsets can now use their hands to use the app, move around in event environments, and interact with objects. Motion controllers continue to be supported, and users can switch between using controllers or their hands while using the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Viva Connections cards in Microsoft 365 Copilots
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 Copilot brings Viva Connections cards to conversations. When a card is relevant for a specific topic, the card will surface in the conversation chat and users will be able to interact with it directly from Microsoft 365 Copilot without interrupting the user's flow.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Introducing archival and other enforcement actions with inactive site lifecycle management policy
CurrentVersion.description: Address inactive content on your tenant with inactive sites policy. Admins can configure policies to Detect inactive sites, send notifications to all site owners, and archive these sites or put them in a read-only state if there is no action from notification recipients.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Graph Connectors in CIQ
CurrentVersion.description: When grounding your prompts in BizChat, you will be able to use CIQ to scope to your 3P data from your Graph Connectors.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Collaborative authoring
CurrentVersion.description: Multiple authors can collaborate on a Viva Amplify publication at the same time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Manual sync trigger options for provider data
CurrentVersion.description: Customers can manually trigger sync for different data types on Manage providers in Viva Learning admin page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sync provider data from a specific date range
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing flexibility on provider setup form where admins can sync data from specific dates for a provider instead of full data sync.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Site access review from Sharing link reports in Data Access Governance
CurrentVersion.description: Site access review allows SharePoint admins to delegate access governance to site owners in the context of potential oversharing as defined within DAG reports. We earlier released site access review from within "Content shared with everyone except external users" report. Now, the same functionality will be available from all "Sharing link" reports as well.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Auto-run Data Access Governance (DAG) reports
CurrentVersion.description: You can now schedule to run your DAG reports automatically every 28 days and also receive notification when the auto-run completes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Setup wizard UX improvements for Workday integration
CurrentVersion.description: The Workday setup wizard will be modular and more intuitive going forward.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Vote on and archive Questions in Teams Q&A
CurrentVersion.description: Question voting allows instance participants to upvote the most important questions and sort by highest votes or recent activity. This gives moderators the ability to derive insights from the audience about what topics they care the most about and address them. Additionally, for questions that might be outdated or irrelevant, moderators can move them to a separate feed to ensure that presenters can focus on providing the most value to attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Advanced Management - Restricted content discoverability
CurrentVersion.description: This is part of SharePoint Advanced Management capabilities which allows SharePoint admins to restrict content discoverability in organization-wide search and Copilot experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remote contact management for common area phones
CurrentVersion.description: This roadmap item is cancelled and replaced by 81379. We are sorry for any inconvenience. IT admins will be able to manage and add contacts to Teams phone devices deployed in shared spaces through the Teams admin center. This ensures users across the organization can easily call important contacts, such as emergency numbers or help desks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution available in additional meeting spaces
CurrentVersion.description: You can now take advantage of speaker recognition and transcript attribution, and AI capabilities in additional meeting spaces, from those equipped with a Teams Room to those relying on a user's PC in a bring you own device (BYOD) room. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique voice profile for each participant enabling intelligent recaps and maximum value from Microsoft 365 Copilot in Teams meetings. Users can easily and securely enroll voices via Teams Settings. A Teams Premium license is required on the host desktop in a BYOD room.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot on OneNote canvas
CurrentVersion.description: Use Copilot right in your workflow by invoking Copilot to generate a summary, a to-do list, or help you rewrite the content on the page or based on your selection.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Enterprise Application Insights for SharePoint sites
CurrentVersion.description:
Enterprise Application Insights is a powerful report which helps SharePoint Administrators to discover all the SharePoint sites that are allowed access by third-party applications registered in your tenant. The report also provides details on the application's permission and requests count to help admins take further action to strengthen the security of the site.

It is part of SharePoint Advanced Management capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Authoring Copilot in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: Authoring Copilot in SharePoint combines the power of Large Language Models (LLMs), your data in the Microsoft Graph, and best practices to create engaging new web pages. It can utilize built-in templates or custom templates from your organization, along with existing documents as grounding data, to generate high-quality page content. All of this is achieved while upholding our commitment to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Custom question benchmark mapping
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Glint survey creators will be able to associate a custom question with a Viva Glint benchmark to leverage the benchmark in the reporting UI.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Custom question benchmark mapping
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Glint survey creators will be able to associate a custom question with a Viva Glint benchmark to leverage the benchmark in the reporting UI.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Summarize files shared in Teams chat with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Summarize action on files shared in Teams chat, will allow users to summarize files with one click using Copilot within one-on-one or group chats. It will work on common file types like Word and PDF to start with and other formats will be added over due course. This requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Bulk operations summary in the Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can monitor and track the status of all bulk operations on Teams Devices through the Teams admin center, enabling large-scale management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Name pronunciation
CurrentVersion.description: You can now record and share the correct pronunciation of your name, promoting inclusivity and helping colleagues avoid mispronunciations. With a click, you can play and listen to your colleagues' name pronunciations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot web grounding now available in the Copilot app in Teams and Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: Ground your Copilot chat conversations with the latest information from the web in the Copilot app in Teams and Outlook

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose between Copilot Business Chat with web or work grounding
CurrentVersion.description: In Outlook for iOS and Android, you will soon be able to choose whether Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat uses Microsoft 365 Graph (work) or Web grounding via a Work/Web toggle within the chat interface, just like you can at microsoft365.com/chat. Web grounding will be available for all commercial Microsoft 365 customers, while Graph grounding will require a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Charts, Graphs and Data Analysis in Copilot for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: Use prompts to create charts, graphs, and data analysis in Business Chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Data Security Analytics
CurrentVersion.description:
Data Security analytics will serve as a launchpad for administrators, enabling them to swiftly navigate day-to-day tasks. It will provide a comprehensive overview of an organization’s sensitive data landscape, visibility into potential risks, and offer contextual recommendations to strengthen the organization's data security posture. The Data Security Copilot will serve as an intelligent AI assistant layered on top of data security analytics, supporting tasks related to administration, risk assessment, alert triage, and reporting. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Usage reports for bookable desks in the Pro Management portal
CurrentVersion.description: With a Teams Shared Device license assigned to a desk pool, admins can view valuable analytics for these spaces including number of peripherals, usage, reservations, and occupancy under 'Reports' in the portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-meeting Chat, Copilot, Notes, panes can be popped out from the meeting window
CurrentVersion.description: When you are in meetings or calls, you will be able to pop out, drag, and resize your meeting panes from the meeting window. This includes Chat, Copilot, and Notes side panes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-meeting Chat, Copilot, and Notes panes can be popped out from the meeting window
CurrentVersion.description: When you are in meetings or calls, you will be able to pop out, drag, and resize your meeting panes from the meeting window. This includes Chat, Copilot, and Notes side panes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Stream Custom Agent and Bot Responses
CurrentVersion.description: Custom engine agents and Teams bots can now stream responses like Microsoft Copilot. They can provide real-time updates on their actions while delivering parts of the response as they generate it, making interactions feel faster and more engaging.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – AI enabled file summaries on Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly get a summary of Word, PPT, and PDF files that were shard with you in chat, without leaving your flow of work. Tap the summary icon on the file, and get a summary generated by Copilot. Now you can consume and comprehend the content without reading the entire document on a small mobile screen.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect prompt injection attacks and mentions of protected materials in GenAI prompts and responses
CurrentVersion.description:
In Communication Compliance, we're introducing the ability to detect potentially risky Generative AI interactions using Azure Content Safety's Prompt shields and Protected materials classifiers. Detect risk of jailbreak prompt exploitation by malicious users and identify if GenAI responses contain branded/copyrighted material so organizations can maintain content originality and protect their reputations.

Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Restrict access action support for semantic models in Fabric
CurrentVersion.description: Your organization can now control who can access your data depending on the sensitive information detected in Fabric semantic models. DLP restrict access action allows you to block access to guest users or all users depending on what labels or sensitive information types match your sematic models. This is in addition to the ability already supported by DLP policies to audit and notify users via Policy Tips based on sensitive content within Fabric semantic models and lakehouses.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Space analytics with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: ?In space analytics, use Copilot to analyze and explain key data points and trends in your space utilization graphs. It compares current utilization metrics such as occupancy, desk usage, and room bookings against previous time periods (e.g. last month, last quarter), highlighting important changes and trends.
